resource.chars:
inconvenience I should recommend 
that in the plates All the brains 
be drawn to the same <u>absolute <\u>
length, as the variations in 
proportion become in this way
far more obvious -
Furthermore as M. Gratiolet has 
already maintained the view 
that the Lemurs form a distinct 
subseries[?] - a reference should be added to this effect - to that 
part of Mr Flowers’ paper which 
deals with this question 
Thomas H. Huxley 
The Committee of Papers 
Royal Society
